on Sunday. Media reports during Egypt's political unrest had quoted Zahi Hawass as saying that looters damaged two mummies, but in a BBC interview on Sunday he said that this was not the case. They were not mummies, there were two skulls taken outside from the CT scan machine. Everything will go back to normal at Cairo Museum today, said Zahi Hawass , head of Egypt's antiquities authority since 2002. He was made a cabinet minister last week. The 50-year-old actress- who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the US TV show- believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. "He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Eigenaren van websites kunnen met Adsense via Google ingekochte advertenties op hun sites tonen, waarbij Google een deel van de omzet opstrijkt. Het vierde kwartaal was een geweldig einde van een topjaar. Onze prestaties werden gedreven door een snel groeiende digitale economie en de enorme interesse voor onze nieuwe activiteiten, zoals banneradvertenties en mobiel , aldus Google-topman Eric Schmidt , die aan zijn laatste kwartaal als directeur van Google is begonnen. Tegelijk met de presentatie van de kwartaalcijfers maakte Google namelijk bekend dat Eric Schmidt in april het stokje zal overdragen aan medeoprichter

There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done, Page said. Although he tried to debunk the idea in Thursday's interview, Eric Schmidt may have been growing weary of all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinized companies.
